thread.title: CyberOptics Third Quarter 2015 Conference Call Scheduled for October 27
thread.title_full: CyberOptics Third Quarter 2015 Conference Call Scheduled for October 27

author: admin
title: CyberOptics Third Quarter 2015 Conference Call Scheduled for October 27
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/26/2015 @ 6:28 AM   CyberOptics Corporation 
MINNEAPOLIS -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- CyberOptics Corporation (Nasdaq: CYBE) will hold its conference call to review operating results for the third quarter of 2015 on Tuesday, October 27 at 4:30 PM Eastern. The third quarter earnings release will be issued at the close of the market that day. Investors can access the live call by dialing toll-free 888-337-8169 prior to the start of the call and providing the conference ID: 9783344. A webcast of the live conference call, which will be archived for 30 days, can be heard by visiting the investor relations section of the CyberOptics website, www.cyberoptics.com . A replay of the call, available one hour after the call, can be accessed by dialing 888-203-1112 and providing conference ID: 9783344. The replay will be available for 30 days following the call. 
About CyberOptics CyberOptics Corporation ( www.cyberoptics.com ) is a leading global developer and manufacturer of high precision sensing technology solutions. CyberOptics’ sensors are used in general purpose metrology and 3D scanning, surface mount technology (SMT) and semiconductor markets to significantly improve yields and productivity. By leveraging its leading edge technologies, the company has strategically established itself as a global leader in high precision 3D sensors, allowing CyberOptics to further increase its penetration of key vertical segments. Headquartered in Minneapolis, Minnesota, CyberOptics conducts worldwide operations through its facilities in North America, Asia and Europe.
